## BindingFromClassOptions type

Options to customize the binding created from a class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BindingFromClassOptions = {
    key?: BindingAddress;
    type?: string;
    name?: string;
    namespace?: string;
    typeNamespaceMapping?: TypeNamespaceMapping;
    defaultScope?: BindingScope;
};
```
